nodes.bodyText:
You know you can send \n in chat right? You don't need to send 30 messages. 1 message with \n.
It's great. M
Should null check, anytime you encounter a boxed value you always have to null check.
Yeah not gonna convert this one really. Having a StringBuilder for this would just be extremely ugly here.
Quite cumbersome to have this in one line

This is supposed to be Blocks and the other Chunks.
This is doing avg/block

Again this in the one line looks really cumbersome. Also the fact it's used in at least 2 places means this should probably be a util method.
Would make this clearer and avoid human error which is definitely possible for something like this.
Thank god this mess is gone
